name: Impact (itch) (FallingBear)
description:
Fast paced galactic shooter with a twist. All objects rotate around the world so beware of bullets coming from another side.

Controls:

Press I to toggle input method

WSAD or Arrow keys / Mouse= Movement
LMB  RMB = Shooting

Tools:

Unity3D
Blender

The game is not finished, I would like to spend a little more time on it. If you want so stay updated, follow me on twitter @FallingBear3

Yeah and I did not make any music, yuo can listen to this tune while playing the game. http://www.newgrounds.com/audio/listen/557983
